  #include<iostream>
  #include<stdio.h>
  #include<algorithm>
  #include<vector>
  #include<string>
  #include<map>
  #include<queue>
  #include<cmath>
  #include<stack>
  #include<sstream>
  #include<list>


  using namespace std;


  typedef long long ll;
  typedef long l;

  #define floop(i,n) for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
  #define floopk(i,n,k) for(ll i=0;i<n;i+=k)
  #define si(n) scanf("%ld",&n)
  #define po(n) printf("%ld",n)


  int main()
  {
      //std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
      l t;
      si(t);
      while(t--){
            l n,m,p,q,s;
            si(n);si(m);si(p);si(q);si(s);
            if(q==s)
                cout<<p<<"\n";
            else{
                l rad=n-m+1;

                l cnt1=max(ceil((double)(m-1)/q),ceil((double)(m-1)/s));
                l pnt1=((q*cnt1)-m+1)%rad;
                l pnt2=((s*cnt1)-m+1)%rad;
                q%=rad;
                s%=rad;
                p=p-cnt1;
                l tot=0;
                if(pnt1==pnt2 && m!=1)
                    tot++;
                floop(i,p){
                    pnt1+=q;
                    pnt1%=rad;
                     pnt2+=s;
                    pnt2%=rad;
                    if(pnt1==pnt2)
                        tot++;


                }
                cout<<tot<<"\n";

            }



      }


      return 0;
  }
